Articles.Content:
The Voyager spacecrafts, like the Pioneer ones, were still are carrying the pretty detailed descriptions of the Earth and the Earthlings.

Mission 1. Year 0001.
Repeat the Grand Tour program by launching a small insterstellar scientific probe, full of the native planet images, sounds, texts, etc, to let a highly developed ET civilisation know about us.
Use gravitational maneuvers, etc.

Mission 2. Year 0201.
Build a vessel (crewed or uncrewed), chase, locate, and destroy the interstellar scientific probe before a highly developed ET civilisation has known about us.
sooo, are there any actual rules, etc. since if not, your gonna see everyone install KSPIE and use a engine with several milion ISP to get there
